Class Tank

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      objectdraw.ActiveObject
          GameObject
              Tank
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Tank
extends GameObject

A single Tank, animated as a thread.

Author:
Seth Battis

Constructor Detail

Tank

public Tank(TankWars aGame,
            ControlSet aControlSet,
            GameObject[] someGameObjects)
Construct a new tank.

Parameters:
aGame - The game within which the tank is playing.
aControlSet - A control set for this tank (should be unique within the game).
someGameObjects - The other game objects that the tank (and its bullets) will test for collisions.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Animate the actions of the tank (until the game is over).

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

reset

public void reset()
Reset a tank that is either new to the game or that has been hit by a bullet. Tanks are positioned randomly, but no closer than TankWars.MARGIN to other game objects and to the edge of the game board.

turnLeft

public void turnLeft()
Turn the tank TankWars.ANGLE_INCREMENT radians to the left.

turnRight

public void turnRight()
Turn the tank TankWars.ANGLE_INCREMENT radians to the right.

speedUp

public void speedUp()
Increase the speed of the tank by TankWars.SPEED_INCREMENT.

slowDown

public void slowDown()
Decrease the speed of the tank by TanksWars.SPEED_INCREMENT.

fire

public void fire()
If the tank has not currently maxed out its limited supply of bullets, fire another bullet. Bullets are fired in the direction in which the tank is facing, at the same velocity (plus a little bit) as the tank itself.

overlaps

public boolean overlaps(objectdraw.FilledOval other)
Overrides:
overlaps in class GameObject
Parameters:
other - Another object on the canvas.
Returns:
True if the other shape overlaps the body of the tank.

public boolean overlaps(objectdraw.FilledRect other)
Overrides:
overlaps in class GameObject
Parameters:
other - Another object on the canvas.
Returns:
True if the other shape overlaps the body of the tank.

move

public void move(double dx,
                 double dy)
Advance the tank to its next location.

Parameters:
dx - Amount to adjust the X-coordinate.
dy - Amount to adjust the Y-coordinate.

alignBarrel

private void alignBarrel()
Realign the barrel to point in the current direction of travel.

getColor

public java.awt.Color getColor()
Returns:
The color of the tank.

expireBullet

public void expireBullet(Bullet bullet)
Stop tracking an "expired" bullet (one that has collided with another game object or left the canvas).

Parameters:
bullet - The bullet to expire.

Overrides:
